content: Time your attacks well to find the gaps in his defenses, and remember to cultivate your Spirits and upgrade your Transformation Spell abilities as needed. When Non-Pure is finally defeated, you'll be able to absorb the last disciples spirit, the Non-Pure Spirit.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Pure.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Pure', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-Pure' and the sub-subsection 'Non-Pure Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Time your attacks well to find the gaps in his defenses, and remember to cultivate your Spirits and upgrade your Transformation Spell abilities as needed. When Non-Pure is finally defeated, you'll be able to absorb the last disciples spirit, the Non-Pure Spirit.
